group_1.textLeft: [chara:305801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ahhhhh~!!
I ATE IT!!

group_1.textRight: Aah!

group_1.textLeft: Oops, my bad for waking you up.
You surprised me there, buddy.
The second we got here, you fell asleep.
Well, you are exhausted after all!

group_1.textRight: You should've woken me up...
(I mean, she... saw me sleeping...)
(...Well, whatever.)
So, why are you this hungry?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I hadn't eaten or drank anything since morning.@Looking for shoes, going to the Coordinators'...
Guess I got a bit too hyped about it.
Nahaha.

group_1.textRight: You hadn't eaten or drank anything since this@morning...
Y-yet I still couldn't beat you...! Even when you're@in such a state...!

group_1.textLeft: There, there, don't be discouraged.
I mean, being sleep-deprived, you weren't in the@best shape either.

group_1.textRight: Thanks for the support.

group_1.textLeft: Though... you seemed to be sleeping soundly@just now.

group_1.textRight: Mhm.
I think I won't have nightmares about that day@anymore.

group_1.textLeft: I see.
That's a relief.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:302101:lipSynch_1]Hey.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What's up?

group_1.textRight: I know I said earlier that I'd become your friend,@but...
Maybe we still shouldn't meet each other anymore.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Whaaa?!

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry.
But, after all, where we stand is just too different...
I'm not mentally prepared to overcome that and@start seeing you.
It's an issue regarding feelings.
If I put it behind and start meeting you more often,
It might allow me to pretend that what I had with@that girl never really happened.
She told me to forget about her, but...
I don't wanna forget, after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
Well, I guess that's just the way it is.

group_1.textRight: You and I will always be best friends, but let's say@goodbye here.
For now.

group_1.textLeft: I understand.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry.
Because, you've truly saved my heart.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it wasn't a waste of time.
And you know, they say "time spent without each@other nurtures love".

group_1.textRight: Don't put this in a misleading way, 'kay?

group_1.textLeft: Even though we'll be far apart, we're still gonna@be best mates by heart and soul.
That means we're soul mates!

group_1.textRight: Well, if that's how you want to put it...

group_1.textLeft: Then, let's shake hands.

group_1.narration: ―Sakuya―@Not that I'm saying this 'cause of your enthusiasm@just now, but... Until we leave this store today,
―Ryouko―@...You said "until we leave this store", right...?
―Sakuya―@Yeah, I did, but... What's the matter?@You're smirking...

group_1.textLeft: Too bad, Sakuya!
We aren't leaving this place for awhile!

group_1.textRight: I swear, Ryouko, you're such a crazy lil' dumbass...

group_1.textLeft: Whatever you say!

group_1.textRight: I mean, aren't you supposed to be a temple girl?@So why are you eating so much junk food?

group_1.textLeft: It's fine. I'm not a monk.
For man, the sincerest act is savouring savoury@food.
Gotta gratefully devour the earthly desires of salt@and grease and protein!

group_1.textRight: Honestly, it's kinda refreshing seeing you go@that far.
I have to limit myself to eating my favourite@ramen just once a month.

group_1.textLeft: What?! Is that for track?!

group_1.textRight: Exactly!
Keeping this physique is hard work too!
Hands off me.

group_1.textLeft: But, you still eat tsukemen or something when@you can't resist, right?

group_1.textRight: No, I don't! That's not what limits are about!

group_1.textLeft: So strict!
Is the track team a monk group?

group_1.textRight: Scary!
I just imagined an army of monks running as@fast as they can and... [chara:302101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302101:motion_400][chara:302101:lipSynch_1]scary!

group_1.narration: After that we lost track of time and just chatted,@everything from the stuff we like and hate...@what it's like commuting to school,@our worries for the future...
All of it shallower than a puddle in summer.@So very shallow, so jumbled up, so... trivial.@All those words: meaningless.
Not at all did it feel like a final@conversation before farewell.
It was as if we were two ordinary best friends,@who were guaranteed to meet again tomorrow...
